about_the_game:
Acoustic simulation for professionals to experience the essence of sound

Soundscape is an interactive platform for game developers and sound designers to deeply understand stereophonic technology.

"Soundscape" uses Yamaha Corporation's stereophonic sound technology Sound xR™.

“This application uses Sound xR spatial audio processing engine for earphones and headphones, i.e. Binauralizer from Yamaha Corporation.”

5 acoustic exploration modes

Precise acoustic experience

Bird call localization

Accurate localization of sound sources in natural environments

Subtle sound travel and distance analysis

Urban Acoustic Challenges

Extracting specific sounds in complex sound environments

Understanding realistic acoustic spaces

Sound Source Tracking

Identifying the exact source of an explosion

Practical understanding of sound propagation mechanisms

Acoustic space navigation

Understanding space based on sound alone

Deep insight into sound localization and spatial awareness

Analysis of moving sound

Experience the sound changes of a racing kart and a train

Detailed observation of dynamic acoustic environments

Technical Stereophonic Experience

Experience realistic sound using Sound xR's stereophonic technology. This is a technical and experimental game that goes deeper than regular stereophonic acoustics.

Acoustic technology for professionals

Simulation of a variety of sound sources and acoustic environments

Advanced acoustic experience with standard headphones

Acoustics directly applicable to game development

Acoustic tools for indie game developers and engineers

This simulation is not just a game, but a practical learning platform for acoustic technology.

Practical understanding of stereophonic sound technology

Insights into acoustic design in game development

Stimulates technical creativity

System Requirements

OS: Windows 10 64bit

Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher

Memory: 4 GB RAM

Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2 GB) or higher

Storage: 5 GB available free space

Sound: Stereo headphones required

Controls

Keyboard or controller to explore sound sources

Deep understanding of the technical aspects of stereophonic sound

Explore new horizons of acoustic technology from a professional perspective.

Translated with (free version)

legal_notice:
アンサンブルシミュレーターはヤマハ株式会社の立体音響技術Sound xRを用いています。
This application uses Sound xR spatial audio processing engine for earphones and headphones, i.e. Binauralizer from Yamaha Corporation.
name: Sound scape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2 GB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: 「サウンドスケープ」は音の本質を体験する、プロフェッショナルのための音響シミュレーションです。 ゲーム開発者とサウンドデザイナーのための、立体音響技術を深く理解するインタラクティブ・プラットフォームです。
